title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
description: After the Rebels are brutally overpowered by the Empire on the ice planet Hoth, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Yoda, while his friends are pursued by Darth Vader.

title: Raging Bull
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Leading Role
description: The life of boxer Jake LaMotta, whose violence and temper that led him to the top in the ring destroyed his life outside of it.

title: The Shining
description: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where a sinister presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from the past and of the future.

title: Airplane!
description: A man afraid to fly must ensure that a plane lands safely after the pilots become sick.

title: The Elephant Man
description: A Victorian surgeon rescues a heavily disfigured man who is mistreated while scraping a living as a side-show freak.

title: Ordinary People
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Supporting Role
Best Writing, Screenplay Based on Material from Another Medium
description: The accidental death of the older son of an affluent family deeply strains the relationships among the bitter mother, the good-natured father, and the guilt-ridden younger son.

title: Coal Miner's Daughter
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Leading Role
description: The story of country music legend Loretta Lynn, from her humble beginnings in Kentucky to international superstardom.

title: Caddyshack
description: An exclusive golf course has to deal with a brash new member and a destructive dancing gopher.

title: The Blues Brothers
description: Jake Blues, just released from prison, puts together his old band to save the Catholic home where he and his brother Elwood were raised.

title: Friday the 13th
description: A group of camp counselors are stalked and murdered by an unknown assailant while trying to reopen a summer camp which was the site of a child's drowning and a grisly double murder years before.

title: 9 to 5
description: Three female employees of a sexist, egotistical, lying, hypocritical bigot find a way to turn the tables on him.

title: Altered States
description: A Harvard scientist conducts experiments on himself with a hallucinatory drug and an isolation chamber that may be causing him to regress genetically.

title: American Gigolo
description: A Los Angeles male escort, who mostly caters to an older clientele, is accused of a murder which he did not commit.

title: Atlantic City
description: An aging small-time gangster meets a young clam bar waitress who dreams of becoming a blackjack dealer.

title: The Big Red One
description: A veteran sergeant of World War I leads a squad in World War II, always surviving while the members of his squad die.

title: The Blue Lagoon
description: In the Victorian period, two children are shipwrecked on a tropical island in the South Pacific. With no adults to guide them, the two make a simple life together, unaware that sexual maturity will eventually intervene.

title: Brubaker
description: The new warden of a small prison farm in Arkansas tries to clean it up of corruption after initially posing as an inmate.

title: The Changeling
description: A man staying at a secluded historical mansion finds himself being haunted by the presence of a spectre.

title: Dressed to Kill
description: A mysterious blonde woman kills one of a psychiatrist's patients, and then goes after the high-class call girl who witnessed the murder.

title: Fame
description: A chronicle of the lives of several teenagers who attend a New York high school for students gifted in the performing arts.

title: Flash Gordon
description: A football player and his friends travel to the planet Mongo and find themselves fighting the tyrant, Ming the Merciless, to save Earth.

title: The Fog
description: An unearthly fog rolls into a small coastal town exactly 100 years after a ship mysteriously sank in its waters.

title: The Gods Must Be Crazy
description: A comic allegory about a traveling Bushman who encounters modern civilization and its stranger aspects, including a clumsy scientist and a band of revolutionaries.

title: Heaven's Gate
description: A sheriff protects immigrant farmers from wealthy cattle barons in late 19th century Wyoming.

title: Kagemusha
description: A petty thief with an utter resemblance to a samurai warlord is hired as the warlord's double. When the warlord dies the thief is forced to take up arms in his place.

title: The Last Metro
description: In Nazi-occupied Paris, a theater actress must keep her Jewish husband hidden in the basement of the theater while she continues her work and deals with a new leading man.

title: The Long Riders
description: The origins, exploits and the ultimate fate of the Jesse James gang is told in a portrayal of the bank robbers made up of brothers who are played by real-life brothers.

title: Melvin and Howard
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Supporting Role
Best Writing, Screenplay Written Directly for the Screen
description: A down-on-his-luck milkman gives a ride to a grumpy old man who claims to be Howard Hughes.

title: Mon oncle d'Amérique
description: The lives of three people are analyzed by a scientist who explains their behavior through the lens of evolutionary psychology.

title: My Bodyguard
description: A new kid at school hires the biggest, toughest student as his bodyguard to protect him from a bully.

title: Popeye
description: Popeye the sailor man arrives in the town of Sweethaven in search of his father, but has to face the bully Bluto to win the heart of Olive Oyl.

title: Private Benjamin
description: A sheltered young high society woman joins the United States Army on a whim and finds herself in a more difficult situation than she ever expected.

title: Somewhere in Time
description: A Chicago playwright uses self-hypnosis to travel back in time and meet the actress whose vintage portrait hangs in a grand hotel.

title: Stardust Memories
production_studio: Jack Rollins & Charles H. Joffe Productions
description: A filmmaker recalls his life and loves - the inspirations for his films - while attending a retrospective of his work.

title: The Stunt Man
description: A fugitive from the law inadvertently stumbles onto a movie set and is hired as a stunt man, but he soon begins to suspect that the director is trying to kill him.

title: Superman II
description: Superman agrees to sacrifice his powers to start a relationship with Lois Lane, unaware that three Kryptonian criminals he inadvertently released are conquering Earth.

title: Tess
description: A strong-willed young peasant girl becomes the affection of two men.

title: Urban Cowboy
description: Bud is a young man from the country who learns about life and love in a Houston bar.

title: Used Cars
description: When the owner of a struggling used car lot is killed, it's up to his hot-shot salesman to save the property from falling into the hands of the owner's ruthless brother and used-car rival.

title: Xanadu
description: A struggling artist meets a girl who may hold the key to his future.

title: Breaker Morant
description: Three Australian lieutenants are court martialed for executing prisoners as a way of deflecting attention from war crimes committed by their superior officers.

title: Cannibal Holocaust
description: During a rescue mission into the Amazon rainforest, a professor stumbles across lost film shot by a missing documentary crew.

title: Cruising
description: A police detective goes undercover in the underground S&M gay subculture of New York City to catch a serial killer who is preying on gay men.

title: Inferno
description: An American college student in Rome and his sister in New York investigate a series of killings in both locations where their resident addresses are the domain of two covens of witches.

title: The Long Good Friday
description: Harold, a prosperous English gangster, is about to close a lucrative new deal when bombs start showing up in very inconvenient places. A mysterious syndicate is trying to muscle in on his action.

title: The Ninth Configuration
description: A new commanding officer arrives at a remote castle serving as an asylum for insane and AWOL U.S. Marines, where he attempts to rehabilitate them by allowing them to live out their fantasies.

title: Bad Timing
description: A psychiatrist living in Vienna enters a torrid relationship with a married woman that spirals into obsession.

title: Bronco Billy
description: An idealistic, modern-day cowboy struggles to keep his Wild West show afloat in the face of hard luck and waning interest.

title: Stir Crazy
description: Set up and wrongfully accused, two best friends will be sent to prison for a crime they didn't commit.

title: Any Which Way You Can
description: Philo Beddoe and his orangutan Clyde take on a new adventure involving underground fighting.
